activities: Korn/Ferry develops and hosts for its corporate customers talent and performance management platforms (“Executive Centers”) that enable their customers to measure, monitor and track their employees through behavioral assessments, goal setting, performance review, progress monitoring and compensation setting.  Korn/Ferry’s customers collect personal information from their employees such as name, email address, resume information (e.g., employment history, education, job qualifications, professional credentials, memberships in professional organizations, skills, language skills), performance and compensation information.  This information is collected either offline or through the Executive Center and then maintained on the site which is hosted by Korn/Ferry in the United States. Access to the information is limited to the individual’s employer and selected Korn/Ferry employees who are responsible for maintaining and updating the Executive Center application.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline/online personal info from Ex Ctr
